entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • What's with "Enumerable.Reverse()"? #109255
  • Cleanup `NET6_0_OR_GREATER` symbol #109254

Closed

  • Very slow access to certain site when IPv6 is enabled #109195
  • [Question] Path.GetFullPath doesn't take ~ on unix in account #109250
  • Launching problem #109251

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Enable EVEX embedded broadcast in more places #109258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove special REX.W handling for some instructions #109257
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • unblock inlining of generics with static fields #109256
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Exclude shared libs from ilcframework in nupkg #109253
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement IUtf8SpanParsable on System.Version #109252
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label

Merged

  • Fix typo `commmon` -> `common` #109248
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Remove ManagedThreadBase_FullTransition/NoADTransition distinction #109249
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix unhandled exception test for composite r2r case #109244
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add ReferenceHandler to JsonSourceGenerationOptions #109174
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

Updated

  • Factor LibraryImports in `System.Transactions.Local` to Common\ #109222
    area-System.Transactions, community-contribution
  • Fixed dependency injection event source tests randomly failing. #107465
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • JIT: enable devirtualization/inlining of other array interface methods #109209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete DomainAssembly #108618
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update stepping through ExternalMethodFixup under the Debugger #108942
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add overview of runtime logging to the Book of the Runtime #98881
    documentation, area-Meta, runtime-coreclr
  • Further clean up usages of LowLevelList<T> #109114
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Conditionally check the compiler flags in libs.native #109228
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • use `Stopwatch.GetElapsedTime` for rate limiter #109213
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • Define __assume on unix #109247
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
